title: What Matters This Week in the 2020 Race
text:
When President Trump traveled to Pittsburgh this week for a speech to a friendly audience, he attracted media attention mostly because of a head-scratching passage in which he declared that his administration was building a border wall in Colorado, which happens to abut New Mexico rather than Mexico.

That oddity aside, the Pittsburgh trip signaled something more subtle and important. Though the visit was technically for presidential rather than campaign business, the event at which Mr. Trump spoke felt similar to a campaign...
description: White House business has been taking President Trump to states that are important to his re-election bid next year.
